activities: Corporate financial statements, Individual financial statements, Tax ID numbers, EIN Numbers, banking account numbers, banking routing numbers Swift Codes, Sort Codes, IBAN numbers. Corporate and individual addresses, trade/payment history, sales/billing/invoicing data, credit card and other data as is related to extending credit, invoicing, billing, and payments for goods and services primarily in B2B transactions. Information is received in order to create customer records for extending and managing credit risk, invoicing, receiving, and applying payments. Information is captured during system implementations, at the beginning of and throughout a trade event, and as long as entities or individuals are trading with HighRadius customers.
personaldata: We process below data: •	Firstname, Lastname, Full name of users. •	Email address •	Phone/Fax, as applicable to specific process. •	Social security #, applicable only for Credit processing. •	Bank account information, applicable for Cash/Credit processing
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
